Common Helpers.name: isValid
Common Helpers.description:
Returns false if argument is Invalid Date and true otherwise.
Invalid Date is a Date, whose time value is NaN.

Time value of Date: http://es5.github.io/#x15.9.1.1

returns.description: date is valid

exceptions.description: Argument must be an instance of Date

Common Helpers.name: parse
Common Helpers.description:
Parse the date string representation.
It accepts the ISO 8601 format as well as a partial implementation.

ISO 8601: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601

params.description: the ISO 8601 formatted string to parse
params.name: dateStr

returns.description: parsed date in the local time zone.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: endOfISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Return the end of an ISO week-numbering year,
which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday.
The result will be in the local timezone.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: end of an ISO year

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Return the end of an ISO week-numbering year for the given date.

returns.description: number of ISO weeks in a year

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Get the number of weeks in the ISO week-numbering year.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: getISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Get the ISO week-numbering year of the given date,
which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: ISO year

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Are the given dates in the same ISO week-numbering year?

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: isThisISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description: Is the given date in the same ISO week-numbering year as the current date?

returns.description: the date is in this ISO week-numbering year

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Is the given date in the same ISO week-numbering year as the current date?

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: lastDayOfISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Return the last day of an ISO week-numbering year,
which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday.
The result will be in the local timezone.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: end of an ISO year

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Return the last day of an ISO week-numbering year for the given date.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: setISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Set the ISO week-numbering year to the given date,
saving the week number and the weekday number.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: new date with the ISO year setted

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: startOfISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Return the start of an ISO week-numbering year,
which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday.
The result will be in the local timezone.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: start of an ISO year

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Return the start of an ISO week-numbering year for the given date.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: subISOYears
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Subtract the specified number of ISO week-numbering years from the given date.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

params.description: of ISO week-numbering years to be subtracted
params.name: amount

returns.description: new date with the ISO week-numbering years subtracted

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Subtract the specified number of ISO week-numbering years from the given date.
